text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Error Rates for Bucket Operations>
We have identified the cause of the increased error rates for customers creating and managing Amazon S3 buckets and are working towards resolution. Only a small subset of requests are affected and retries are working.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Error Rates for Bucket Operations>
Between 7:54 AM and 9:18 AM PDT, S3 customers saw elevated errors and latency for a subset of API requests to create and manage Amazon S3 buckets. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
